channel.title: Releases on Data Science for Earth
channel.description: Recent content in Releases on Data Science for Earth

item.title: Welcome to Data Science for Earth
item.description: This blog is created and maintained by Babak J.Fard, a PhD candidate in Sustainability and Data Science (SDS) lab, at Northeastern University. The purpose is to share ideas, codes, and analyses related to the environmental problems and present small samples of using Data Science for Good. Posts may contain contain only , or a mixtures of codes and data analytics related to an environmental problem. Comments on posts are greatly appreciated, in a hope of creating an interacive environement of sharing ideas and learning.
